entity.cmd: /tip Ctrl+F1打开帮助界面 /tip 选择“新手教程”，完成里面的任务 /t 2 /menu help.help.tutorial

inventory.slot: {{{"<%=EditEntityPage.GetCommand()%>",name="![CDATA[",},name="cmd",},{{"if $(dist @a) < 20 then#if $(dist @a) > 2 then# walk -to @a -dist 1# say right click me to edit my logics#fi#fi#/t 2 /activate ",attr={count=1,id=10059,},name="slot",},name="rulebag",},name="entity",attr={bz=19222,motionZ=-0.01129,onGround=true,displayName="ElectricFan",class="NPC",item_id=30001,motionX=0,model_filename="blocktemplates/electric_fan.bmax",bx=19202,can_random_move=false,showHeadOn=true,facing=3.05188,by=5,name="ElectricFan",motionY=0,},}

entity.cmd: /tip 这句话来自命令方块 /t 4 /tip 命令方块只被激活一次

inventory.slot: {timeseries={movieblock={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="movieblock",},music={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="music",},tip={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="tip",},time={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Linear",name="time",},cmd={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="cmd",},blocks={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="blocks",},text={times={0,4952,10249,21748,34151,43406,55798,},data={{fontsize=20,text="电影方块包含摄影机和演员",},{fontsize=20,text="你现在看到的内容来自第一个电影方块.",},{fontsize=20,text="当电影方块播放完毕, 它会发射一个信号到周围的方块,#中继器可以捕获这个信号并沿着导线传递信号",},{fontsize=20,text="这个例子中， 信号会先激活一个命令方块#随后激活第二个电影方块",},{fontsize=20,text="除了用导线, 更精确的链接电影方块的方式是#采用子电影方块",},{fontsize=20,text="但是用中继器和导线链接更加的直观。#没有摄影机的电影方块可以同时播放。",},{fontsize=20,text="现在第一个电影方块即将结束#我们准备跳到第二个电影方块",},},ranges={{1,7,},},type="Discrete",name="text",},},}

{timeseries={music={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="music",},movieblock={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="movieblock",},tip={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="tip",},cmd={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="cmd",},time={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Linear",name="time",},blocks={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="blocks",},text={times={0,},data={{textanim="fadeinout",textpos="center",text="恭喜！你掌握了基本的操作#下面继续学习高级操作",},},ranges={{1,1,},},type="Discrete",name="text",},},}

{timeseries={music={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="music",},movieblock={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="movieblock",},tip={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="tip",},time={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Linear",name="time",},cmd={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="cmd",},blocks={times={995,1816,4156,7788,9865,12522,14630,17317,},data={{},{[5077069303]={19235,5,19303,255,2,},[5077069302]={19235,5,19302,197,1,},},{},{[5077099302]={19236,5,19302,255,20,},[5077069302]={19235,5,19302,197,3,},},{},{[5076979304]={19232,5,19304,255,14,},[5076979303]={19232,5,19303,197,},},{},{[5076979299]={19232,5,19299,197,2,},[5076949299]={19231,5,19299,255,8,},},},ranges={{1,8,},},type="Discrete",name="blocks",},text={times={1187,8490,16462,21945,25000,},data={{fontsize=30,textanim="fadeinout",text="中继器的摆放位置",},{fontsize=30,textanim="fadeinout",text="以及一些特殊方块的摆放位置",},{fontsize=30,textanim="fadeinout",text="就是我们视觉朝向的位置",},{fontsize=30,bganim="fadein",textanim="fadeinout",bgcolor="#000000",text=" ",},{fontsize=30,textanim="fadeinout",bgcolor="#000000",text=" ",},},ranges={{1,5,},},type="Discrete",name="text",},},}

{timeseries={music={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="music",},movieblock={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="movieblock",},tip={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="tip",},cmd={times={909,8931,15764,},data={"/select ~-2 ~0 ~-5","/select ~-9 ~0 ~-5 (7 0 10)","/select-clear",},ranges={{1,3,},},type="Discrete",name="cmd",},time={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Linear",name="time",},blocks={times={176,4735,9242,},data={{[5977159212]={19238,6,19212,255,8,},},{[5976949220]={19231,6,19220,255,20,},},{},},ranges={{1,3,},},type="Discrete",name="blocks",},text={times={176,4221,8457,12556,},data={{fontsize=30,text="按【Ctrl+左键】点选左下角方块",},{fontsize=30,text="再按【Ctrl+左键】点击右上角的方块",},{fontsize=30,text="此时两点之间的矩形区域都被选中了",},{fontsize=30,text="你可以对选中的方块做各种操作",},},ranges={{1,4,},},type="Discrete",name="text",},},}

{timeseries={movieblock={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="movieblock",},music={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="music",},tip={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="tip",},cmd={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="cmd",},time={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Linear",name="time",},blocks={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="blocks",},text={times={0,2797,6383,10953,15740,20818,26580,32549,38704,45419,51388,56984,63792,70041,75170,81606,86642,},data={{fontsize=20,text="在电影方块中使用BMAX模型, 你首先需要创建一个通用角色",},{fontsize=20,text="选择这个角色并将它的模型属性改为你的BMAX文件",},{fontsize=20,text="你可以改变演员的大小",},{fontsize=20,text="对它的骨骼做动画",},{fontsize=20,text="选择左下角的骨骼属性然后选择骨骼进行编辑",},{fontsize=20,text="通常，你可以旋转骨骼制作动画",},{fontsize=20,text="你也可以用反向动力学通过控制末端骨骼的位置控制多个骨骼的旋转",},{fontsize=20,text="快捷键【1 2 3 4 5】可快速切换骨骼编辑模式",},{fontsize=20,text="骨骼位移和放缩也是支持的，但是不太常用",},{fontsize=20,text="请注意你可以放缩骨骼3个轴中的任何一个",},{fontsize=20,text="所选择的骨骼的关键帧在下方时间轴上显示",},{fontsize=20,text="按【ESC】建退出选择当前骨骼。#你会发现此时关键帧显示的是所有骨骼的关键帧",},{fontsize=20,text="此时你可以通过关键帧来同时调整所有的骨骼",},{fontsize=20,text="骨骼动画可以与角色动作混合使用",},{fontsize=20,text="例如你可以将挥手的骨骼动画与走路动作(id=4)混合起来",},{fontsize=20,text="动作捕捉可通过插件实现",},{fontsize=20,text="现在自己试试看吧",},},ranges={{1,17,},},type="Discrete",name="text",},},}

{timeseries={music={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="music",},movieblock={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="movieblock",},tip={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="tip",},time={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Linear",name="time",},cmd={times={0,6088,12827,20630,28374,35172,42324,49004,54265,60000,},data={"/show desktop.builder.static","/show desktop.builder.movie","/show desktop.builder.character","/show desktop.builder.playerbag","/show desktop.builder.gear","/show desktop.builder.deco","/show desktop.builder.tool","/show desktop.builder.env","/show desktop.builder.static","/show desktop.builder off",},ranges={{1,10,},},type="Discrete",name="cmd",},blocks={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="blocks",},text={times={0,5497,13064,21103,28019,35409,42620,49241,55389,},data={{textpos="center",text="按【E】键打开或关闭物品栏",},{text="电影分类与电影和人物创作相关#例如电影方块， 骨骼， 模型，彩色方块等",},{text="人物分类包含各种会动的人物",},{text="背包是你随身携带的物品#下方快捷栏中的物品也都在这里",},{text="机关分类与逻辑相关#命令方块， 电路，代码书等在这里",},{text="装饰分栏包含特殊形状的物品#例如：火把，楼梯，植物等",},{text="工具栏是一些创作工具#例如：彩色方块, 代码书，命令书",},{text="最上面，还可以切换到环境设置",},{text="现在你自己试试吧",},},ranges={{1,9,},},type="Discrete",name="text",},},}

{timeseries={music={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="music",},movieblock={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="movieblock",},tip={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="tip",},cmd={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="cmd",},time={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Linear",name="time",},blocks={times={0,5429,5967,6505,7043,},data={{[6877249262]={19241,7,19262,21,},},{[6877249262]={19241,7,19262,21,},[7777249262]={19241,8,19262,253,5,{name="entity",attr={bz=19242,bx=19187,pz=0,py=0,by=8,class="EntityBlockBone",item_id=253,px=0,},},},},{[6877249262]={19241,7,19262,21,},[7777249262]={19241,8,19262,253,5,{name="entity",attr={bz=19242,bx=19187,pz=0,py=0,by=8,class="EntityBlockBone",item_id=253,px=0,},},},[6877249263]={19241,7,19263,253,3,{name="entity",attr={bz=19243,bx=19187,pz=0,py=0,by=7,class="EntityBlockBone",item_id=253,px=0,},},},},{[6877249262]={19241,7,19262,21,},[7777249262]={19241,8,19262,253,5,{name="entity",attr={bz=19242,bx=19187,pz=0,py=0,by=8,class="EntityBlockBone",item_id=253,px=0,},},},[6877249263]={19241,7,19263,253,3,{name="entity",attr={bz=19243,bx=19187,pz=0,py=0,by=7,class="EntityBlockBone",item_id=253,px=0,},},},[6877249261]={19241,7,19261,253,2,{name="entity",attr={bz=19241,bx=19187,pz=0,py=0,by=7,class="EntityBlockBone",item_id=253,px=0,},},},},{[5977249262]={19241,6,19262,253,4,{name="entity",attr={bz=19242,bx=19187,pz=0,py=0,class="EntityBlockBone",by=6,item_id=253,px=0,},},},[6877249261]={19241,7,19261,253,2,{name="entity",attr={bz=19241,bx=19187,pz=0,py=0,class="EntityBlockBone",by=7,item_id=253,px=0,},},},[6877249262]={19241,7,19262,21,},[7777249262]={19241,8,19262,253,5,{name="entity",attr={bz=19242,bx=19187,pz=0,py=0,class="EntityBlockBone",by=8,item_id=253,px=0,},},},[6877249263]={19241,7,19263,253,3,{name="entity",attr={bz=19243,bx=19187,pz=0,py=0,class="EntityBlockBone",by=7,item_id=253,px=0,},},},},},ranges={{1,5,},},type="Discrete",name="blocks",},text={times={0,4411,},data={{fontsize=30,text="【骨骼】在独立的情况下",},{fontsize=30,text="以方块面的朝向为基准",},},ranges={{1,2,},},type="Discrete",name="text",},},}

{timeseries={movieblock={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="movieblock",},music={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="music",},tip={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="tip",},time={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Linear",name="time",},cmd={times={14065,19607,27506,},data={"/editblock ~2 ~5 ~-3","/editblock ~2 ~1 ~-3","/editblock ~2 ~5 ~-2",},ranges={{1,3,},},type="Discrete",name="cmd",},blocks={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="blocks",},text={times={0,7413,14411,19607,23764,27506,29930,35543,39145,42194,45242,48083,52727,55845,},data={{fontsize=20,text="This demo shows how to create a custom character from blocks #and spawn it with a command block",},{fontsize=20,text="First you create something with blocks",},{fontsize=20,text="Bone blocks can be used create models with joints",},{fontsize=20,text="Nearby blocks with same color belongs to the bone",},{fontsize=20,text="Each bone points to its parent bone",},{fontsize=20,text="Right click a bone to edit its name and logics",},{fontsize=20,text="We will name this bone \"wheel\", which will automatically rotate #when the whole character moves",},{fontsize=20,text="This is a command block",},{fontsize=20,text="Right click it, you will see several commands.",},{fontsize=20,text="/select and /savemodel cmds just save blocks to a file",},{fontsize=20,text="the interesting part is the /spawn command",},{fontsize=20,text="/spawn command will spawn a character using items #in the command block, which is a Universal Character item.",},{fontsize=20,text="if you right click the spawned character, you can edit its logics #with rule items.",},{fontsize=20,text="You can put character items with different logics into #a command block to spawn.",},},ranges={{1,14,},},type="Discrete",name="text",},},}

{timeseries={music={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="music",},movieblock={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="movieblock",},tip={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="tip",},cmd={times={},data={},ranges={{1,0,},},type="Discrete",name="cmd",},time={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Linear",name="time",},blocks={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="blocks",},text={times={0,5221,13793,20541,27438,35123,41330,48769,},data={{textpos="center",bgcolor="#000000",textanim="fadeinout",bganim="fadeinout",text="世界由物品，方块和人物三种类型构成",},{textpos="center",text="物品：是界面上的图标#方块：是3D世界中你看到静止的部分#人物：是会动的，比如电影演员",},{textpos="center",text="物品， 方块与人物三者之间可以相互转化#例如： #Alt+左键可以将场景中的方块或人物变成手中的物品#场景中的方块可以变成会动的人物",},{textpos="center",text="另外， 三者之间又可以相互嵌套。#例如：方块中可以有物品， 物品中可以包含方块",},{textpos="center",text="例如，右键点击左侧的命令方块#可以看到里面包含的物品",},{textpos="center",bgcolor="#000000",textanim="fadeinout",bganim="fadeinout",text="你可以通过三种方式创造世界",},{textpos="center",text="第一种是通过用户界面(鼠标+键盘)#第二种是通过命令行#第三种是通过NPL语言(也就是代码)",},{textpos="center",text="随着学习的深入， 你将掌握全部三种方式#越后面的方式功能越强大。",},},ranges={{1,8,},},type="Discrete",name="text",},},}

{timeseries={movieblock={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="movieblock",},music={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="music",},tip={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="tip",},time={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Linear",name="time",},cmd={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="cmd",},blocks={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="blocks",},text={times={0,2466,2635,5293,},data={{fontsize=30,textpos="center",textanim="fadeinout",bgcolor="#000000",text="这是我的第一个作品",},{fontsize=30,textpos="center",textanim="fadeinout",bgcolor="#000000",text=" ",},{fontsize=30,textpos="center",textanim="fadeinout",bgcolor="#000000",text="谢谢观赏！",},{fontsize=30,textpos="center",bganim="fadeout",textanim="fadeout",bgcolor="#000000",text="谢谢观赏！",},},ranges={{1,4,},},type="Discrete",name="text",},},}

{timeseries={movieblock={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="movieblock",},music={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="music",},tip={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="tip",},cmd={times={0,},data={"/select -all ~-1 ~1 ~-4 (3 0 2);/savemodel horse;/select -clear",},ranges={{1,1,},},type="Discrete",name="cmd",},time={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Linear",name="time",},blocks={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="blocks",},text={times={0,2530,},data={{fontsize=20,textpos="center",text="骨骼方块介绍",},{fontsize=20,textpos="center",text="骨骼方块用于定义动态人物中的关节",},},ranges={{1,2,},},type="Discrete",name="text",},},}

{timeseries={movieblock={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="movieblock",},music={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="music",},tip={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="tip",},time={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Linear",name="time",},cmd={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="cmd",},blocks={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="blocks",},text={times={0,6575,14684,22246,30356,38685,46575,55780,62465,69698,78027,87013,94356,104328,114520,},data={{fontsize=20,text="Making character animations is easy.#Yet, making good ones requires patience",},{fontsize=20,text="First, you need to add actors to the movie block.",},{fontsize=20,text="Click the \"+\" button in the movie clip window to add an actor",},{fontsize=20,text="By default camera actor is already created as #the first item in the movie clip.",},{fontsize=20,text="All items (cameras, actors) in movie clip are standard items#which you can clone(Ctrl+left click), throw away and move around.",},{fontsize=20,text="Right click the actor's icon to select it#or right click the actor itself in the 3d scene to select.",},{fontsize=20,textpos="center",bgcolor="#000000",bganim="fadein",text="Now we are going to make some character animations ",},{fontsize=20,textpos="center",bgcolor="#000000",bganim="fadeout",text="To make animation, #the most simple way is to press the record button (R key).",},{fontsize=20,text="In recording mode, the timeline is red, and #all your physical actions are recorded",},{fontsize=20,text="Press Ctrl+Z to undo recording, or begin recording from a given time#to overwrite previous data. ",},{fontsize=20,text="The camera actor can also be recorded in this way, #except that camera keyframes are always displayed on the timeline #for better timing and referencing.",},{fontsize=20,textpos="center",bgcolor="#000000",bganim="fadeinout",text="You can also tweak animations directly using keyframes",},{fontsize=20,text="Once an actor is selected, click the variable button on the left of the timeline#to change current selected variable of the actor. ",},{fontsize=20,text="The most frequently used one is the bone variable.#press 1 key twice to select bones",},{fontsize=20,text="now try it yourself",},},ranges={{1,15,},},type="Discrete",name="text",},},}

{timeseries={movieblock={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="movieblock",},music={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="music",},tip={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="tip",},time={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Linear",name="time",},cmd={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="cmd",},blocks={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="blocks",},text={times={0,4139,8372,12878,},data={{fontsize=20,text="Once you have a bmax file, you can drag it to an open movie block#to create an actor out of it",},{fontsize=20,text="You can also manually add actor by click the + button #in the movie clip window",},{fontsize=20,text="Each bone of the actor can be animated individually.",},{fontsize=20,text="Try it yourself",},},ranges={{1,4,},},type="Discrete",name="text",},},}

{timeseries={music={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="music",},movieblock={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="movieblock",},tip={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="tip",},time={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Linear",name="time",},cmd={times={1447,},data={"/select ~-6 ~0 ~0",},ranges={{1,1,},},type="Discrete",name="cmd",},blocks={times={0,},data={{[5077039206]={19234,5,19206,255,8,},},},ranges={{1,1,},},type="Discrete",name="blocks",},text={times={0,},data={{text="【Ctrl + 左键 】点击方块可选中这个方块",},},ranges={{1,1,},},type="Discrete",name="text",},},}

{timeseries={movieblock={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="movieblock",},music={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="music",},tip={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="tip",},time={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Linear",name="time",},cmd={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="cmd",},blocks={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="blocks",},text={times={0,4080,12150,21132,31650,43518,},data={{fontsize=20,bgcolor="#000000",textpos="center",textanim="fadeinout",bganim="fadeinout",text="这句文字来自第二个电影方块",},{fontsize=20,text="一个电影方块可以包含多个摄影机镜头#任意多的字幕，声音，命令或子电影方块等",},{fontsize=20,text="右键点击电影方块背包中的角色图标可选择角色",},{fontsize=20,text="点击时间轴左下角的属性按钮改变当前选择的角色变量",},{fontsize=20,text="对于动态人物， 你可以录制人物动作或直接调整骨骼",},{fontsize=20,text="右键点击电影方块可编辑它#自己试试看吧~",},},ranges={{1,6,},},type="Discrete",name="text",},},}

{timeseries={movieblock={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="movieblock",},music={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="music",},tip={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="tip",},cmd={times={41570,60277,},data={"/editblock ~-1 ~1 ~-4","/editblock ~2 ~5 ~-5",},ranges={{1,2,},},type="Discrete",name="cmd",},time={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Linear",name="time",},blocks={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="blocks",},text={times={0,4352,9512,14922,22445,30077,35984,41517,47041,53134,58429,63730,68227,},data={{fontsize=20,text="在世界中, 我们往往需要用上千的彩色方块创建模型。#为了演示, 我们将只用少数的方块演示骨骼方块的使用。",},{fontsize=20,text="骨骼方块有6个方向",},{fontsize=20,text="骨骼方块之间有父子关系#子骨骼的方向永远指向父骨骼",},{fontsize=20,text="骨骼的颜色由与它后方相连的方块决定#如果后方无方块，则从它周围4个面获取颜色",},{fontsize=20,text="每个骨骼会控制与它同颜色的方块",},{fontsize=20,text="没有链接的方块将以合理的方式自动与#某个骨骼相连",},{fontsize=20,text="符合特殊形态的骨骼组合会被识别为四肢。#并可用反向动力学(IK)控制. ",},{fontsize=20,text="【Ctrl+右键】点击骨骼，可以查看与之相连的骨骼",},{fontsize=20,text="在骨骼预览模式下， 右键点击骨骼可编辑骨骼属性#例如：名字和规则",},{fontsize=20,text="特殊名字的骨骼有特殊的默认动画#例如：名字为\"wheel\"的骨骼是轮子",},{fontsize=20,text="与骨骼同色的方块在预览模式中会被高亮。",},{fontsize=20,text="骨骼的原点可以通过拖动3D坐标轴改变",},{fontsize=20,text="当你对自己的模型满意后, 你可以选择它#并保存为BMAX模型文件， 并在电影方块中用作演员",},},ranges={{1,13,},},type="Discrete",name="text",},},}

{timeseries={movieblock={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="movieblock",},music={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="music",},tip={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="tip",},time={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Linear",name="time",},cmd={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="cmd",},blocks={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="blocks",},text={times={0,3261,6171,6398,7647,8000,},data={{text="这是我做的宠物",textanim="fadeinout",},{text="他的名字叫Smily",textanim="fadeinout",},{text=" ",},{bgcolor="#000000",bganim="fadein",text=" ",},{bgcolor="#000000",text=" ",},{bgcolor="#000000",text=" ",},},ranges={{1,6,},},type="Discrete",name="text",},},}

{timeseries={movieblock={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="movieblock",},music={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="music",},tip={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="tip",},time={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Linear",name="time",},cmd={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="cmd",},blocks={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="blocks",},text={times={0,2278,7764,9049,},data={{textpos="center",text="这里有3个参考作品",},{textpos="center",text="难度从简单，到普通，到困难",},{textpos="center",text="选择一个你喜欢的故事或自己设计故事",},{text="别忘了，你可以查看每个故事的电影方块",textpos="center",},},ranges={{1,4,},},type="Discrete",name="text",},},}

{timeseries={music={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="music",},movieblock={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="movieblock",},tip={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="tip",},cmd={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="cmd",},time={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Linear",name="time",},blocks={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="blocks",},text={times={8295,11054,13022,30210,},data={{text="请沿着黄线行走",},{text="我们首先学习基本操作",},{text="",},{textpos="center",bgcolor="#000000",textanim="fadeinout",bganim="fadeinout",text="现在你自己试试吧#沿着黄线行走#【W,A,S,D键】",},},ranges={{1,4,},},type="Discrete",name="text",},},}

{timeseries={movieblock={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="movieblock",},music={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="music",},tip={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="tip",},time={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Linear",name="time",},cmd={times={23091,},data={"/take 10",},ranges={{1,1,},},type="Discrete",name="cmd",},blocks={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="blocks",},text={times={0,2971,5549,23091,},data={{fontsize=20,text="彩色方块可以创建出任意颜色的物体",},{fontsize=20,text="【Alt + 左键】 可吸取鼠标所指场景中的颜色",},{fontsize=20,text="【Shift+鼠标滚轮】 改变亮度",},{fontsize=20,text="现在自己试试看吧~",},},ranges={{1,4,},},type="Discrete",name="text",},},}

{timeseries={music={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="music",},movieblock={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="movieblock",},tip={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="tip",},time={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Linear",name="time",},cmd={times={13939,19901,},data={"/loadtemplate -a 8 ~-11 ~0 ~-2 demohouse","/loadtemplate -r ~-11 ~0 ~-2 demohouse",},ranges={{1,2,},},type="Discrete",name="cmd",},blocks={times={},data={},ranges={},type="Discrete",name="blocks",},text={times={0,3754,9482,13803,},data={{textanim="fadeinout",textpos="center",text="练习时间！",},{textanim="fadeinout",textpos="center",text="这里有大量的建造任务#挑选完成1-2个新手教学任务",},{textanim="fadeinout",textpos="center",text="最后在没有提示的情况下#独自完成一个小房子",},{textanim="fadeinout",textpos="center",text="例如这样的小房子",},},ranges={{1,4,},},type="Discrete",name="text",},},}

entity.cmd: . 单击鼠标【右键】创建方块
在上方平台上创建模型 然后点击下方平台的按钮 【Alt + 左键】拾取
· 《看似乖巧的地鼠》 难度：困难
. 请将左侧的蓝色方块消除 【Ctrl+Z】撤销
. 绑定骨骼可以赋予BMAX动作
. 电影制作 原理介绍
. 结果示例 【Alt+左键】 吸取方块
彩色方块 在建造->电影分栏中 可用于创建人物模型
. 电影创作练习 【右键】点按钮
在上方平台上创建模型 然后点击下方平台的按钮 【Alt + 左键】拾取
. 按【E键】, 单击选取蓝色羊毛 . 单击【右键】在左侧创建
. 请用【W, A, S, D】键行走
. 【Ctrl+左键】点击方块 单个选择
命令方块 右键编辑
. 【右键】点击按钮 继续学习
. 长按鼠标【右键】并移动鼠标 转换视角
. 快速建造3个相同的方块
. 人物与骨骼系统 【右键】点按钮
. BMAX系统入门 创造骨骼与人物
右键点击电影方块然后点击播放 1. 扮演角色 2. 直接调整骨骼
. 细节请见教学视频 http://www.paracraft.cn
. 单击鼠标【左键】消除方块
. 按【F】键飞行 【X】下降, 【空格】上升 再按【F】键退出飞行模式
. 请根据你剩下的时间 做出选择 【鼠标中建】可瞬移
. 多次按【Ctrl+左键】 大面积选择
. 欢迎来到 《一小时动画制作》 with Paracraft
. 【ESC】或【E】键 点击上方【帮助】菜单 选择【快捷键】
. 按【/】键 然后输入/tip hello
. Paracraft创意空间 . 基础操作
· 【右键】点击电影方块可编辑 查看下这些动画是如何制作的
. 按住【Ctrl】键，同时滚动【鼠标滚轮】 . 可以缩放视角
【Shift+右键】 点击场景中的方块 【Shift+左键】 删除周围同类型方块
. 练习创建一个小房子 【E】键打开物品栏
骨骼方块 在建造->电影分栏中 可用于创建人物关节
